text: Oleg Gennadyevich Sizov (; born 11 June 1963, in Kuybyshev) is a former Russian football player and coach. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Sportspeople from Samara, Russia Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Uralets Nizhny Tagil players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian football managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Oleg Sizov
